item.title: Review: The Sandman S2 is a classic tragedy, beautifully told
item.description: Stellar cast, lavish visuals make Netflix adaptation of influential graphic novels shine.

item.title: ‘Sandman’ Creator on How the Part 2 Finale Lays Groundwork for a Possible Return to the Universe
item.description: “I hope interest in the show will outlive whatever impact the allegations are having on the viewing public,” Allan Heinberg says when discussing ‘Sandman’ comics creator Neil Gaiman’s downfall and his
